name: r19.29af
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2), w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2), w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))

|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2), w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: A commonly used pattern based on ~ r19.29 . See ~ r19.29a , ~ r19.29an for a variant when ` x ` is disjoint from ` ph ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Nov-2017.)
